nodes.text: Bruno Denturri was a male slaver who was an enemy of the Zygerrian Queen Miraj Scintel. As part of his mission to rescue captured Togruta colonists, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker went under the name "Lars Quell" and claimed he had killed Denturri. Skywalker further claimed that his disguised Padawan Ahsoka Tano was a slave he had captured from Denturri's palace as a gift for the queen. Denturri was a skilled warrior, as Scintel was highly impressed when "Quell" claimed to have defeated him in combat. Scintel also considered him to have an excellent eye for beautiful female slaves.
